Marquis of The Dornish Marches
The Marquis is responsible for defending a realm's border provinces.
Fortified Marches
This province has been fortified with trenches and other anachronistic items.

To the [Root.GetComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], I dutifully accept the responsibility of defending [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName]. Those [target_enemy_schmuck.GetInsultAdjective] [target_enemy_schmuck.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] [target_enemy_schmuck.GetInsultNoun] will never overcome the defensives of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

Marquis of [This.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName]
The Marquis of [This.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName] is responsible for defending a realm's border provinces.

[target_marquis.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s hard work has finally paid off and the fortifications in [From.GetName] have been completed. My castle will stand as an impenetrable bulwark against any who'd dare invade [Root.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName].

My hard work has finally paid off and the fortifications in [From.GetName] have been completed. My castle will stand as an impenetrable bulwark against any who'd dare invade [Root.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName].
I should notify my liege immediately.
I should notify [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s Marquis, [target_marquis.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal].

To the [Root.GetComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], after many months we have finished the fortifications in [FromFrom.GetName]. We are stronger and more prepared than ever.

[From.GetTitledName]
